i:doc.i:header: Path: cs.utexas.edu!natinst.com!news-relay.us.dell.com!jump.net!news-fw!news.mpd!newsgate.tandem.com!su-news-feed1.bbnplanet.com!su-news-hub1.bbnplanet.com!cpk-news-hub1.bbnplanet.com!news.bbnplanet.com!howland.erols.net!infeed1.internetmci.com!newsfeed.internetmci.com!152.163.199.19!portc03.blue.aol.com!newstf02.news.aol.com!audrey02.news.aol.com!not-for-mail From: victina01@aol.com (Victina01) Newsgroups: austin.jobs Subject: TX-AUSTIN: INTERNET/POWERBUILDER EXPERIENCE-VICTINA Date: 28 Aug 1997 15:10:10 GMT Lines: 41 Message-ID: 19970828151001.LAA13197@ladder02.news.aol.com> NNTP-Posting-Host: ladder02.news.aol.com X-Admin: news@aol.com Organization: AOL http://www.aol.com SnewsLanguage: English Xref: cs.utexas.edu austin.jobs:119816
i:doc.i:body:
VICTINA SYSTEMS INTERNATIONAL
Victina is an Austin/Dallas based Information Systems Consulting Company. We specialize in working with both our employees and customers for maximum satisfaction.
LOCATION: Austin, TX
SKILLS:
-Experience in developing on-line transactions processing client/server applications using rapid developmentt techniques with PowerBuilder 5.0 in the MS Windows environment. -Experience developing Internet applications using Sybase tools,e.g. web.pb. -Experience developing Internet commerce applications. -Interactive Voice Response application development. -Experience developing applications using the evolutionary prototyping software development life cycle model. -Experience in deploying client/server applications in a network environment. -Experience designing Sybase databases. -Relevant and recent experience in successfully providing contract programming services. -Operating systems: Solaris and UNIX
Please email resumes to (victina01@aol.com)
Victina Systems International 3532 Bee Caves Road, Suite 202 Austin, Texas 78746 Fax: (512) 327-1651
VICTINA SYSTEMS INT'L
